careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.title: Electrician
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more on Physical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.title: Robotics Technician
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more on Physical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
